sentences.sContent: He had dared to speak out against injustice, and overnight he became a national hero .
sentences.sCn: 他敢于站出来抨击不公正的现象，一夜之间就成了国家英雄。

sentences.sContent: His father was a war hero , a former fighter pilot.
sentences.sCn: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.sContent: the unsung heroes who drove convoys of aid to Bosnia
sentences.sCn: 运载援助物品到波斯尼亚的那些无名英雄

sentences.sContent: Phileas Fogg, hero of Jules Verne’s ‘Around the World in Eighty Days’
sentences.sCn: 斐利斯•福格，儒勒•凡尔纳《八十天环游地球》的男主人公

words.tran: 英雄的；英勇的；记叙英雄及其事迹的；夸张的
英勇，英雄气概；英雄行为；勇敢的事迹

trans.tranCn: 英雄，勇士；男主角，男主人公
trans.tranOther: a man who is admired for doing something extremely brave
